## ProgressIndicatorService.showProgress() method

Displays progress indicator after short delay

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
showProgress(messages: string[]): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  messages | string\[\] | Array of messages to display what is happening |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
